original_title: FLOSS Weekly Episode 794: Release Them All with JReleaser
original_content:
This week Jonathan Bennett and Katherine Druckman chat with Andres Almiray about JReleaser, the Java release automation tool thats for more than just Java, and more than just releases. What was the original inspiration for the tool? And how does JReleaser help avoid a string of commits trying to fix GitHub Actions? Listen to find out!

 https://andresalmiray.com
 https://github.com/aalmiray
 https://www.linkedin.com/in/aalmiray
 https://jreleaser.org

Did you know you can watch the live recording of the show Right on our YouTube Channel? Have someone youd like us to interview? Let us know, or contact the guest and have them contact us! Take a look at the schedule here.

Direct Download in DRM-free MP3.
If youd rather read along, heres the transcript for this weeks episode.

title: JReleaser: より多くのことを提供するJavaリリース自動化ツール
body: Jonathan BennettとKatherine DruckmanがAndres AlmirayとJReleaserについて話す。JReleaserはJavaのリリース自動化ツールで、GitHub Actionsの修正をサポートする。生放送はYouTubeで視聴可。FLOSS Weekly Podcastをフォロー。
titles: JReleaser: より多くのことを提供するJavaリリース自動化ツール
JReleaser: GitHub Actionsの問題を解決する方法
JReleaser: Java以外の用途にも適用可能
JReleaser: 元々のアイデアとは？
Jonathan BennettとKatherine DruckmanがAndres AlmirayとJReleaserについて語る
